metadata.title: The role of lung ultrasound in the assessment of novel coronavirus pneumonia

body_text.text: As a rapid, convenient, radiation-free, economic, repeatable and bedside visual examination technology for the lung diseases, lung ultrasound plays an essential role in the diagnosis and treatment of critical patients. Lung ultrasound has full advantages in the differential diagnosis of pulmonary exudative diseases, the evaluation of pleural effusion, the recognition of pneumothorax, the evaluation of dyspnea and acute respiratory failure patients, as well as in the monitoring of treatment, the evaluation of curative effect and the guidance of treatment, and has formed a consensus of many experts worldwide. Because of highly infectiousness of the novel coronavirus pneumonia, we should make full use of lung ultrasound to guide diagnosis and treatment during the different stages of the disease.
body_text.section: Characteristics of pulmonary ultrasound

body_text.text: Linear hyperecho starts from pleura line and is perpendicular to it at the same time radiates longitudinally to the deep part of the lung field.
body_text.section: Line B ::: Main signs of lung ultrasound#!start#2#!sep#bib0002#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#3#!sep#bib0003#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#4#!sep#bib0004#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: Under real-time ultrasound, with the respiratory movement, lung point is the boundary point between the existence of pulmonary slip and the disappearance of pulmonary slip.
body_text.section: Lung point ::: Main signs of lung ultrasound#!start#2#!sep#bib0002#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#3#!sep#bib0003#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#4#!sep#bib0004#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: The sign reflects the insufficient inflation of lung with the movement of pleura line consistenting with that of heart. The existence of this sign can exclude pneumothorax.
body_text.section: Pulmonary pulsation sign ::: Main signs of lung ultrasound#!start#2#!sep#bib0002#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#3#!sep#bib0003#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#4#!sep#bib0004#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: When the lung slip disappears, the particle like spot echo under the pleura line is replaced by a series of parallel lines under M-mode ultrasound.
body_text.section: Stratospheric sign ::: Main signs of lung ultrasound#!start#2#!sep#bib0002#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#3#!sep#bib0003#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#4#!sep#bib0004#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: There are more than two consecutive costal spaces in any scanning area with fusion B line.
body_text.section: Alveolar interstitial syndrome ::: Main signs of lung ultrasound#!start#2#!sep#bib0002#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#3#!sep#bib0003#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#4#!sep#bib0004#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: Dense B line is found in each scanning area of both lungs.
body_text.section: White lung ::: Main signs of lung ultrasound#!start#2#!sep#bib0002#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#3#!sep#bib0003#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#4#!sep#bib0004#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: There are the formation of serous, fibrin exudate and hyaline membrane in the alveoli. The epithelial cells of type II alveoli proliferate significantly. The blood vessels of the alveoli septum are congested and edematous and bleeding and necrotic of the pulmonary tissue is also found. Some alveoli exudates are organized and pulmonary interstitial fibrosis can be found. The beginning of the onset of patients often starts from the lateral zone of the lung, close to the pleura. Therefore, pulmonary ultrasound can more effectively observe the pathological changes and dynamic changes of the lung condition.
body_text.section: Pathological changes of lung#!start#5#!sep#bib0005#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: Solid tissue echo is shown after the complete loss of lung tissue gasification, with patchy or "liver like change" of different sizes, which may be accompanied by "sign of broncho inflation " or "sign of broncho fluid filling ".
body_text.section: Pulmonary consolidation ::: Abnormal ultrasound image of lung#!start#2#!sep#bib0002#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#3#!sep#bib0003#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#4#!sep#bib0004#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: Hypoechoic or non-echoic areas is shown in pleural cavity, with cord like separation. When empyema occurs, it should be distinguished from solid lung tissue.
body_text.section: Pleural effusion ::: Abnormal ultrasound image of lung#!start#2#!sep#bib0002#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#3#!sep#bib0003#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#4#!sep#bib0004#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: There are disappears of pleura line, A line and lung sliding sign without existence of B line. Lung point can be seen and sign of stratospheric under the M mode.
body_text.section: Pneumothorax ::: Abnormal ultrasound image of lung#!start#2#!sep#bib0002#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#3#!sep#bib0003#!sep#bibr#!end#, #!start#4#!sep#bib0004#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: We should focus on the presence or absence of abnormal pleura line (smooth, continuous), B line (number and distribution), consolidation (range, bronchiectasis), pleural effusion (nature), and pneumothorax and so on. The sonograms of B line, alveolus interstitial syndrome and white lung reflect the degree of content of lung water from light to heavy.
body_text.section: Contents of main observation ::: Changes of lung ultrasound in novel coronavirus pneumonia#!start#6#!sep#bib0006#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: Sezgin C et al have reported that the sensitivity and specificity of pulmonary ultrasound in the diagnosis of pneumonia are 98.0% and 95.8%, respectively4 and the diagnostic rate of pneumothorax can reach 100%.7 The lung ultrasound signs and pathological signs have already been well known by clinicians.
body_text.section: Contents of main observation ::: Changes of lung ultrasound in novel coronavirus pneumonia#!start#6#!sep#bib0006#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: In addition, the novel coronavirus pneumonia is highly infectious. In order to reduce the transmission it is better to perform the examination as less frequently as possible. With the limitation of bedside chest X-ray especially its high radioactive activity which put high danger to the medical workers and patients lung ultrasound is a better choice of the bedside equipment. With its convenient, noninvasive, repeatable, radiation-free and rapid characteristic, lung ultrasound has been widely used in the critical area. The condition of the novel coronavirus pneumonia changes rapidly, combined with the characteristics of the pathology of pneumonia the new coronavirus, we make better use of lung ultrasound to afford full and effective assessment of the lung condition, which can provide sufficient guidance for diagnosis and treatment.
body_text.section: Contents of main observation ::: Changes of lung ultrasound in novel coronavirus pneumonia#!start#6#!sep#bib0006#!sep#bibr#!end#

body_text.text: First, with its convenient, non-invasive, repeated and non-radioactive characteristic lung ultrasound can be performed beside the bed, which is beneficial to the examiner and the patients, reduces the probability of transmission of the disease.
body_text.section: The advantages of lung ultrasound are summarized as follow

body_text.text: Second, accurate information can be provided to help clear diagnosis according to the imaging of the ultrasound.
body_text.section: The advantages of lung ultrasound are summarized as follow

body_text.text: Third, once the condition of patient changes, it can be quickly examined by ultrasound to further determine whether there is pneumothorax or increasing of pleural effusion. Bedside puncture can be performed by the direction of the lung ultrasound. It also can be clear if there is an increase of lung edema, combined with the parameters of oxygenation, which can direct whether mechanical ventilation and other treatments are needed.
body_text.section: The advantages of lung ultrasound are summarized as follow

body_text.text: Forth, with the evaluation of the condition of the lung, combining parameters of oxygenation, hemodynamics and ventilator determine the timing of the implementation of the Extractorporeal membrane oxygenation.
body_text.section: The advantages of lung ultrasound are summarized as follow

body_text.text: Fifth, for the critically ill patients who have been treated with mechanical ventilation or ECMO, we can dynamically evaluate the condition of the lungs, further clarifying the prognosis.
body_text.section: The advantages of lung ultrasound are summarized as follow

body_text.text: Sixth, the evaluation of inferior vena cava and heart by ultrasound will provide great value for the differential diagnosis when the situation of the patient changes rapidly.
body_text.section: The advantages of lung ultrasound are summarized as follow

body_text.text: Finally, it is easy to acquire and transmit images of the ultrasound, which is essential for remote diagnosis and treatment.
body_text.section: The advantages of lung ultrasound are summarized as follow

body_text.text: There are also limitations of the lung ultrasound especially pathological changes in deep part of lung field and without pathological changes of the pleural, its advantage of the diagnosis is reduced significantly. However, in order to reduce the probability of transmission, to better perform dynamic diagnosis of the novel coronavirus pneumonia and to provide better protection of the medical workers and patients, the lung ultrasound should be taken better full use of.
